content.en: Brain tumor segmentation: Researchers have been exploring the use of various algorithms, such as Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), Fully Convolutional Networks, and Deep Convolutional Neural Networks (DCNN), to automatically segment brain tumors in MRI images. They have also investigated the effectiveness of techniques like Deep Cascaded Neural Networks, Deep Multi-Task Learning Frameworks, and Nonparametric Localization and Enhancement Methods with U-net. These algorithms and techniques aim to improve the accuracy and efficiency of brain tumor segmentation, ultimately aiding in the diagnosis and treatment of patients.
content.da: Hjernesvulstsegmentering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer, såsom Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), Fully Convolutional Networks og Deep Convolutional Neural Networks (DCNN), for automatisk segmentering af hjernesvulster i MR-billeder. De har også undersøgt effektiviteten af teknikker som Deep Cascaded Neural Networks, Deep Multi-Task Learning frameworks og Ikke-parametriske lokalisations- og forbedringsmetoder med U-net. Disse algoritmer og teknikker sigter mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af hjernesvulstsegmentering og dermed støtte i diagnosen og behandlingen af patienter.
